Package task

Class TaskList

java.lang.Object
task.TaskList
public class TaskList extends Object
Represents a list of tasks. This class provides methods for managing tasks (e.g., adding, marking, deleting, and searching tasks).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TaskList()
    Constructs an empty TaskList.
    TaskList(ArrayList<Task> tasks)
    Constructs a TaskList with a specified list of tasks.

    • getTaskListWithKeyWord

      public TaskList getTaskListWithKeyWord(String keyword)
      Filters tasks based on a keyword and returns a new TaskList containing matching tasks.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The keyword to search for in task names.
      Returns:
      A TaskList containing tasks that match the keyword.
